Bands.purpose: Struct defining confidence bands for the curves.

fields.name: conflev
fields.purpose: scalar in the interval (0 1) which contains the confidence level of the bands.

fields.name: nsamp
fields.purpose: Number of subsamples to extract in the bootstrap replicates.

fields.name: nsimul
fields.purpose: number of replicates to use to create the confidence bands.

fields.name: valSolution
fields.purpose: boolean which specifies if it is necessary to perform an outlier detection procedure on the components which have been found using optimalK and optimal alpha.

fields.name: LRtest
fields.purpose: Likelihood ratio test.

fields.name: usepriorSol
fields.purpose: Initialization of the EM for a particular subset.

fields.name: outliersFromUniform
fields.purpose: way of generating the outliers in the bootstrap replicates.

fields.name: nsimulExtra
fields.purpose: number of replicates to use to compute the empirical pvalue of LRtest if multiple solutions are found given a value of alpha

fields.name: nsampExtra
fields.purpose: number of subsamples to extract in each replicate to compute the empirical pvalue of LRtest if multiple solutions are found given a value of alpha

fields.name: usepriorSolExtra
fields.purpose: Initialization of the EM for particular subset.

fields.name: nsamp
fields.purpose: Number of subsamples

fields.name: refsteps
fields.purpose: Number of iterations.

fields.name: reftol
fields.purpose: Tolerance.

fields.name: weights
fields.purpose: Cluster weights.

fields.name: plots
fields.purpose: Plot on the screen.

fields.name: msg
fields.purpose: Message on the screen.

fields.name: nocheck
fields.purpose: Check input.

fields.name: nomes
fields.purpose: Estimated time message.

fields.name: Ysave
fields.purpose: Saving Y.

Pa.purpose: structure defining constraints to apply and model specification.

fields.name: pars
fields.purpose: type of Gaussian Parsimonious Clustering Model.

fields.name: exactrestriction
fields.purpose: If pa.exactrestriction is true the covariance matrices have to be generated with the exact values of the restrictions specified in pa.cdet, pa.shw and pa.swb.

fields.name: cdet
fields.purpose: specifies the the restriction which has to be applied to the determinants.

fields.name: shw
fields.purpose: specifies the the restriction which has to be applied to the elements of the shape matrices inside each group.

fields.name: shb
fields.purpose: specifies the restriction which has to be applied to the ordered elements of the shape matrices across groups.

fields.name: pars
fields.purpose: type of Gaussian Parsimonious Clustering Model.

fields.name: exactrestriction
fields.purpose: If pa.exactrestriction is true the covariance matrices have to be generated with the exact values of the restrictions specified in sph.cdet, sph.shw and sph.swb.

fields.name: cdet
fields.purpose: specifies the the restriction which has to be applied to the determinants.

fields.name: shw
fields.purpose: specifies the the restriction which has to be applied to the elements of the shape matrices inside each group.

fields.name: shb
fields.purpose: specifies the restriction which has to be applied to the ordered elements of the shape matrices across groups.

inputs.name: IDX
inputs.purpose: Assignment of units to groups for different values of c (restriction factor) and k (number of groups).

inputs.name: pivotunits
inputs.purpose: list of the units which must (whenever possible) have the same label.

outputs.name: IDXrelabelled
outputs.purpose: cell with the same size as input cell IDX and withthe same meaning of input cell IDX but with consistent labels.

outputs.name: idxMapping
outputs.purpose: indexes of the permutations associated with IDX{1,1}.

inputs.name: Y
inputs.purpose: Data matrix containing n observations on v variables, Rows of Y represent observations, and columns represent variables.

inputs.name: alpha
inputs.purpose: Vector which specifies the values of trimming levels which have to be considered.

inputs.name: cshape
inputs.purpose: constraint to apply to each of the shape matrices.

inputs.name: equalweights
inputs.purpose: cluster weights in the concentration and assignment steps.

inputs.name: msg
inputs.purpose: display or not messages about code execution.

inputs.name: reftol
inputs.purpose: Default value of tolerance for the refining steps.

inputs.name: startv1
inputs.purpose: define how to initialize centroids and cov matrices.

inputs.name: cleanpool
inputs.purpose: determines if the parallel pool has to be cleaned after the execution of the routine.

inputs.name: numpool
inputs.purpose: number of pools for parellel computing.

inputs.name: k
inputs.purpose: Number of components searched by tkmeans algorithm.

inputs.name: init
inputs.purpose: specifies the point where to initialize the search and start monitoring the required diagnostics.

inputs.name: bsbsteps
inputs.purpose: vector which specifies for which steps of the fwd search it is necessary to save the units forming subset for each random start.

inputs.name: nocheck
inputs.purpose: It controls whether to perform checks on matrix Y.

inputs.name: plots
inputs.purpose: If equal to one a plot of random starts minimum Mahalanobis residual appears  on the screen with 1%, 50% and 99% confidence bands

inputs.name: cleanpool
inputs.purpose: determines if the parallel pool has to be cleaned after the execution of the random starts.

inputs.name: msg
inputs.purpose: Scalar which controls whether to display or not messages about random start progress.

inputs.name: msg
inputs.purpose: Scalar which controls whether to display or not messages about random start progress.

inputs.name: pa
inputs.purpose: Constraints to apply and model specification.

outputs.name: Stable
outputs.purpose: matrix with Gower similarity coefficients in table format.

inputs.name: lim
inputs.purpose: Precision in the calculation of probabilities of overlapping.

inputs.name: lim
inputs.purpose: Precision in the calculation of probabilities of overlapping.
